page.title: 14LAW AND ORDER
page.content: There used to be a{police station}in Axbridge but it was closed down and converted to housing accomodation. Axbridge has only one policeman, he has an office on the side of his house and this has to act as the police station. Our{local policemen}used to drive around in cars that were painted pale blue and white- hence the name panda cars! Now most of the cars are all white with a chequered stripe along the side. They are usually Ford Escorts. The most common problems we have in Axbridge are{vandalism and litter. It is a fairly quiet place and crime is not a serious worry.Because the parking spaces are not clearly marked in the square people park where they shouldn't.Some of the policemen who live in Axbridge work in Cheddar etc.
